::Killfest::

Killfest fronws, still not really convinced. He glances down at the 
lava below, doubting that any of the bots under his command, other 
than possibly Demise, could survive a swim in it.

"Would just the metal protect the people in the dome though? If this 
volcano erupts, I think the dome would either be launched or flipped, 
or at least shaken up quite alot. Will it be able to hold it?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Darkfate::
> 
> "By the Volcano??" said darkfate while he was looking to 
> Killfest "Dome's metals was made with a special proportion of 
Asbesto 
> and trasmetallic technology, lava can't destroy it... If this place 
> erupts all bots outside the dome will be destroyed;  the heat will 
> became energy that thanks a special process of dome structure, is 
> absorbed and became energon... I'm working in experiments that will 
> let my troops survive a erupts... Like me in beast mode."
